Title: Pokémon the Movie: Hoopa and the Clash of Ages
Writer: Atsuhiro Tomioka (screenplay), Satoshi Tajiri (original concept), Junichi Masuda (original concept), Ken Sugimori (original concept)
Actors: Rica Matsumoto, Ikue Ôtani, Mayuki Makiguchi, Yûki Kaji
Plot: When Ash, Pikachu, and their friends visit a desert city by the sea, they meet the Mythical Pokémon Hoopa, who has the ability to summon things-including people and Pokémon-through its ...
